DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the hypothesis that obstructive sleep apnea syndrome is associated with deviant pharyngeal swallowing function, using clinical, endoscopical and manometric evaluation.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Swallowing in Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of obstructive sleep apnea syndrome other causes of dysphagia pharyngeal surgery prior treatment for obstructive sleep apnea
